Description:
The Great Aussie Dream
Located in Kangaroo Flat and enjoying easy access to great schools and shopping, this beautifully presented home has endless appeal. Why bother building when you can move into this well-designed home, drop your bags and embrace the great Aussie dream of home ownership.
Once inside the front door, a lovely master bedroom is situated at the front of the home, complete with ensuite and walk-in robe. Two more bedrooms are located at the rear of the house, both with built in robes and have access to the family bathroom.
The kitchen is modern and convenient with a free standing breakfast bar, pantry, dishwasher and all you could want to cater for family, meals or entertaining. Vinyl plank flooring to the main traffic areas of the house, quality fittings and sparkling clean surfaces add to the overall feeling of comfort. Ducted heating and cooling throughout the home keeps the climate just right all year round.
Outside, in the fully enclosed, secure back yard, there is a large, covered alfresco off the main living area for outdoor entertaining perfect for family gatherings or everyday enjoyment. There is a 4m x 6m shed with slab and power, plenty of room for a veggie garden or play area and the added bonus of side driveway access for a caravan.
Additional features include:
- 12 panel (3.48kw) solar system
- 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms
- Master bedroom with walk-in robe space
- Covered alfresco entertaining
- Shed and secure yard
- 601sqm block in quiet location
Insights: First listed on 23 September, this house has been on Domain for 27 days. It was last sold in 2011 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Relax with a maintenance-free lifestyle
Inspection by appointment only. Please call Kaylene on 0431 039 512.
Downsize in the safe and secure surrounds of this lovely two-bedroom villa. Located in the Aviva Communities Retirement Village, Kangaroo Flat, it offers affordable, independent living for over 55's.
This villa features two bedrooms with robes, spacious open lounge, dining and kitchen equipped with gas cooktop /electric oven, good storage with pantry, ample cupboards and drawers with island bench/breakfast bar separating it from the roomy dining area. Vinyl flooring in lounge, kitchen, dining and hallway. Dining room has direct access to the carport, with ramp entrance. There is a beautiful front porch to relax in the morning sunshine. Fuss-free heating and cooling complement the unit, keeping it cosy or cool year round. Both bedrooms include built-in robes and sit beside the central bathroom and laundry. Outside, the divided tandem carport can be used as a delightful, sheltered outdoor living area if desired while the compact backyard includes garden shed.
Set in lovely garden surrounds, village residents enjoy a relaxed, low maintenance lifestyle amid like-minded neighbours with the added benefit of secure gated entry with CCTV monitoring and a community clubhouse incorporating lounge, kitchen, library, meeting room, gym, cinema, indoor/outdoor bowling, and their own 'Men's Shed'. A team of community gardeners take care of all common spaces to keep the place looking great - there's even a place to store the boat or caravan between trips.
Without a big old home and garden to maintain you will be able to enjoy more time both in and out of the community. It's a short walk to Lansell Square Shopping Centre with public transport at the front and walking tracks nearby for active types.
Purchasers must be over 55 and will be required to enter into a separate agreement with the Aviva Communities.
** COVID19 **
This property is available to inspect by appointment only. To arrange your private viewing please contact Kaylene on 0431 039 512. While attending an inspection, we request that all attendees show their ID and provide contact details before entering the property.

Description:
EVERYTHING IS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS!
Well-presented and in excellent order is this brick veneer home, with all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat nearby. Some of the highlights are primary and secondary schools, child care centre, shops, the new Aquatic Centre, Bendigo Creek Walking Trail, Kangaroo Flat Sports Club, train station, the Rotary Park Lake for the best jam donuts in the world and the CBD of Bendigo is approximately a 8 minute drive away.
The floorplan consists of three bedrooms, master bedroom boasts a walk-in-robe and a three-piece ensuite with shower, vanity and toilet, while the other two bedrooms have built in robes. The family bathroom features a shower, bath, vanity and handy heating duct under the towel rail to dry towels. Both bathrooms have new shower screens and there is new vinyl flooring to all wet areas. The kitchen has gas wall oven and gas cooktop, dishwasher, good amount of cupboards and bench space, large fridge space and backyard views. The adjacent dining area is large enough for the family dining table and a glass slider leads to the alfresco area. The separate spacious lounge is a great place to relax with elevated views over the surrounding neighbourhood. Other notable features are easy care vinyl plank flooring, recent paint, ducted heating and cooling plus a split system to control the comfort levels.
Outside is a huge covered alfresco/entertaining space, perfect for the upcoming summer and entertaining family and friends, a private back yard with low maintenance gardens, sprinkler system, secure fencing and a garden shed for storing the gardening tools and mower. A double carport with remote roller door allows rear access to the backyard which has enough room for a large shed if desired. All this on a 691Sqm block.
In summing up, you have a very well presented and solid home which is ideally suited to first home buyers, singles, couples, families or investors looking to add to their investment portfolio.
Make an appointment today to arrange an inspection.
Internal area
120m²

Description:
Ticks all the boxes
This neatly presented 2 bedrooms 1 bathroom property will surely impress at first glance. From the well landscaped gardens with automatic sprinkler system to the front and back veranda this cute newly renovated weatherboard ticks all the boxes.
Quality kitchen appliances freshly painted and carpeted, ducted heating and cooling all you need to do is move straight in and enjoy the new comforts of what this home provides. Situated on a 729m2 block with plenty of room for the cars, bikes caravan or boat with a huge 16x6.5m shed all your toys will be secure. Reap the rewards with the 5kw solar system reducing those power bills and keeping more dollars in your pocket for the finer things in life.
Previously there was a sizable bungalow in the rear yard, which has recently been removed hence seeing the grass not yet recovered, however this is already set up for another one, or kids retreat should you see fit.
It handy also to know, that the drainage/storm water is already in place on the concrete driveway to be tapped into if you want to build a carport, obviously after obtaining council approval but essentially, the foundations are ready to go.
Whether your a first home buyer, investor looking to down size this one could be for you.
Be quick! The market is supper hot right now and it won't last long. For further details or an inspection give Matt Connolly a call on 0419369844.

Description:
Sensible allotment with side vehicle access
Located on Furness Street but with vehicle access from Cannon Lane, this allotment of 678 sq metres has a great functional design for the perfect home. Close to Lansell Plaza Shopping Centre and public transport, this allotment is perfect for the purchaser seeking a low maintenance home site. A 4.50 metre wide driveway allows access for the widest of vehicles but still allows a lovely frontage of 22 metres to Furness Street which means no ugly garage hanging off the side of your dream home.
- Either commute to Melbourne in 90 minutes or jump on the train at the Kangaroo Flat train station, the options are there
- A great lifestyle is on offer with walking tracks around both Crusoe and No.7 Reservoir a lovely stroll away
- This affordable block is one you should not miss out on
- Titles have been issued and ready for you to construct your new home
- All services available
- Fully Fenced
- Lot 2 - 678m2

Description:
862SQM OF LAND, READY TO BUILD ON NOW!
Located in the bowl of a quiet court in Kangaroo Flat is this superb allotment measuring approximately 862Sqm.
All services are available and the block will be fully fenced. The allotment is perfect for a wide variety of new home designs or a twin unit/townhouse development site (STCA).
Ideally suited to first home buyers, couples, families, downsizers, builders or investors, the block is perfectly located with all the amenities of Kangaroo Flat nearby such as supermarkets, schools, public transport, Kangaroo Flat Sports Club, Rotary Park Lake, Bendigo Creek walking trail, the new indoor swimming pool and is less than a 10-minute drive to the CBD of Bendigo.
There are views of Mt Alexander and nearby bushland.
You may qualify for the $25,000 Government Grant that is available to new home builders.
Don't miss your opportunity to purchase this great block in a very quiet neighbourhood. Call today for more information.

Description:
CHARACTER COTTAGE NEAR ALL AMENITIES
This charming weatherboard cottage is ideally positioned with all
amenities schools, supermarkets, train station, shops, banks, and
more all within easy walking distance. Located on the Melbourne side
of the city, the property has undergone a partial renovation ensuring it is
move-in ready, but with ample opportunity for a new owner to further
make the home their own.
With an abundance of original heritage features, such as high ceilings,
timber flooring, decorative cornice, picture railing and elaborate plaster
work on the ceilings, this home offers plenty of character throughout.
The front garden leads to a wide deck and the main entry. A central
hallway opens off to two bedrooms, one with built-in shelving and a
window seat, and the master with a huge walk-through robe that opens
into a two-way family bathroom. The third bedroom is found at the rear
of the home and, like the other two, is generously proportioned.
At the front of the house is the main living area. The original brick
fireplace sits behind a gas heater, and this room is light yet still cosy. At
the end of the main hallway is an open plan kitchen and dining room.
The kitchen has been completely modernised in a contemporary country
style, with white cabinets and timber benchtops suiting the era of the
build. A large butlers pantry provides additional storage and laundry
facilities. Off the dining area is the family bathroom, also recently
renovated with a freestanding bathtub and walk-in shower, and at the
rear of the home is a multi-purpose room perfect for a home office or
extra living space along with a separate toilet.
The rear door opens out to a sunny back garden where a lawn area and
brick paved courtyard provide space to relax. The long driveway runs
along the side of the house to a carport at the end of the block, offering
good off-street parking.
Additional features include:
- Gas heating in lounge
- Split system heating and cooling in main bedroom
- New bathroom and kitchen
- Modern kitchen appliances including dishwasher and 900mm
stove with five-burner gas cooktop
- Flexible floorplan
- Original character detail including high ceilings, timber flooring,
decorative cornice and ceiling roses, sash windows and picture
railing
- External roller shutters on windows
A fantastic investment property with an established history, this home is
also ideal for a buyer seeking a character build with much of the hard
work done, yet still plenty of opportunity available to add value. Close
proximity to all amenities and positioned on the Melbourne side of the
city makes this an appealing option in many ways.
Insights: 19 Station Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
All round appeal FHOG applicable
Located in a quiet street a short walk to Forest Lake and only a few minutes drive to central Kangaroo Flat is this newly completed home. This will appeal to many buyers with first home buyers potentially able to take advantage of over $40,000 in savings with the first home owners grant and stamp duty exemptions (subject to being approved).
There are many extras included in this home with gas boosted solar hot water and double glazed windows throughout, earning the build a high energy star rating. An added bonus is the three-car garage providing drive through access to the rear yard plus an additional space at the front of the home approximately 8 x 3.5 metres wide intentionally provided for a potential caravan, car or trailer spot. Throughout the home has central gas heating and evaporative cooling.
The home itself has loads of street appeal and inside it delivers neutral colour tones, quality flooring and a great layout. The main bedroom has a separate walk-in robe and ensuite while the remaining three bedrooms are all proportioned with built-in robes. The open plan dining and lounge is bright and airy, bathed in afternoon sun, this adjoins the modern kitchen with a sink overlooking the garden and stainless steel appliances.
Being on the southern side of Bendigo, the suburb of Kangaroo Flat has all the amenities on offer with many walking tracks, lakes, pet recreation areas, major shopping chains, medical centres, a railway station, public transport, a heated pool, gyms and banks so the popularity of the area is appealing to families, retirees and investors alike. Please feel free to view our 3D walk-through and for a private inspection contact listing agents Bendigo Property Plus.

Description:
Sweet Street Charm
Sitting pretty behind a picket fence, just a short stroll from the heart of Kangaroo Flat , is this modern 2 bedroom townhouse on 198m2.
Low maintenance and care-free, but yet so close to all amenities and services. IGA Supermarket, Tri-star Medical Clinic, Kangaroo Flat Train Station and Sports Club all within walking distance.
Offering all the comforts of modern living throughout the home; split system heating/cooling, gas wall furnace and ceiling fans. The kitchen is compact and convenient with upright gas oven, stovetop, range hood and a generous amount of cupboard and bench space. Natural light streams through the living area to the main bedroom, guest room and shared bathroom. Both bedrooms have ceiling fans and built in robes, whilst the bathroom has single vanity, shower and full size bath.
Direct access to the home from the remote roller door carport provides security with a secondary entry point via the loungeroom. Neat, tidy paving minimises the upkeep required with very little yard space to maintain. A garden shed and storage unit provides an easy hide-away for tools, trolleys and treasures that need a home.
Individually titled, no owners corporation fees, this property is a great investment, currently returning a rental amount of $250pw with an excellent tenant. Vacant possession is available for first home buyers/owner occupiers alike. Don't miss this one!!

Description:
The Entertainer
In a stand out position & in a street known for its elaborate houses is this immaculate home set in one of Kangaroo Flats most sort after areas. In an ideal position, only minutes to Lansell Square is this perfect lifestyle property. Entertain your friends and family its all here. If you are not quite ready to downsize and you are looking to upsize your time spent enjoying, this could be the right move for you. The floor plan caters to segmented living which makes way for quality time in your own piece of space. Comprising 3 bedrooms & a large study/office. The main bedroom is situated at the rear of the home separate to the other 2 bedrooms & it is a generous size with walk-through robes leading to en-suite.
Set up for entertaining & featuring the kitchen perfectly positioned as the hub of the home, overlooking the meals and living area & the beautifully manicured gardens. You cannot go past this fantastic plan built & designed by Glen Loddon Homes. Large passageways, generous size bedrooms & 3 separate living areas. Off the living room is anther large separate family room ideal for a cinema or kids retreat. The study is more like an office in its size with views to the front garden.
Other Features include:
Double Glazed Windows, dining and bedroom 1
Security System
Evaporative Cooling
Electric Roller Shutters on all Doors & Windows @ sides & rear
Zoned Ducted Heating
Manicured Gardens & garden beds
Gazebo
Glass splashbacks in kitchen, Dishwasher & Plenty of cupboards
Enclosed Alfresco with timber flooring
15 Solar Panels + 2x2.5 KWH
Step outside to an immaculately kept garden and Gazebo. A 25sq metre shed, side access through double gates & gas boosted solar hot water. Plenty of room to store your caravan & Double lockup garage.
Enjoy all the amenities Kangaroo Flat has to offer with Lansell Square Shopping Centre almost at your door step only a short 8 minute walk. Tranquil bush walks make a lovely added feature to this wonderful package. Private and public schools, public transport with the Kangaroo Flat Train Station only 10 minutes away, supermarkets, post office, indoor aquatic centre, Medical Centre & much much more.
Inspection by appointment contact: Rod Jones M: 0428 444 882
Kim Lawford M: 0413 825 470
* all sizes are approximate only. Plan is for illustrative purpose only. Buyers due diligence checklist https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Address: Lot 1 Secluded Place Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555
Description:
Secluded Place Estate: Substantial Allotment 1973m2
For those who had given up hope of ever finding large building allotments in a suburban position, here is your opportunity to secure an impressive, boutique allotment. Titles issued and ready for settlement so you can commence building your new home.
Zoned General Residential, all services will be available to the allotment.
Seclusion and privacy within a private court, with a scenic outlook of established trees and plant life. All within a few minutes drive to shopping, schools, recreational facilities and medical care.
Exceptional frontage and generous building guidelines will ensure abundant space to build your dream residence, and still have ample room to build a shed or park a caravan, trailer, or boat.
Premium allotment, situated amongst quality homes, only a short walk from the scenic Forest Lake.
Directions: Enter Aspera Way off Queen Street. Secluded Place is accessed from Aspera Way.
Lots 2 & 4 also available

Description:
QUALITY MACQUARIE HOME
Presentation, location and value. This modern, brick-veneer home is nestled on a corner block of 415m2 with lovely, landscaped, low-maintenance gardens and side access via large single garage with auto-roller door and is only 15 years old. Private, fenced and enclosed garden area paved with established ornamental trees and shrubs on the southern side plus a sun drenched alfresco area that is accessed through double doors on the north side plus a Colorbond garden shed. The open plan kitchen has an electric wall oven, gas cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher, roll top workbench and ample cupboards. The adjacent meals area overlooks the ever changing vista of the side patio. Ducted gas heating and cooling throughout. Built-in robes in all three bedrooms with the main bedroom accessing a semi ensuite. Good paint work, furnishings and security doors and solar boosted HWS. This maintenance-free home is ideal for retirees or an astute investor. Inspect by appointment.

Description:
WARM AND WELCOMING HOME IN TRANQUIL DAVA COURT WITH GREAT OUTDOOR SPACE!
Nestled in a quiet court, in a peaceful neighbourhood and in excellent original condiiton is this warm and welcoming home. A credit to the current owners, it is clear this property has been loved and well maintained. Some minor cosmetic changes will modernise and update while the floor plan is perfect just the way it is; offering three bedrooms, master with ensuite, kitchen with gas cooking and a spacious lounge. Highlights include the double garage, the workshop, undercover entertaining area and large secure rear yard. Located within 5 minutes drive to the Kangaroo Flat Train Station and a relaxed and easy walk to Lansell Plaza this property would make a fabulous family home or smart investment whether it is updated or kept exactly as it is.

Description:
Charming Character
Bendigo Property Plus are proud to be marketing this secure home nestled on a nice sized block in the quiet end of Short Street. They dont make homes like they used to and when walking up to the entrance with sash windows, timber fretwork and front door with pattern stain glass features you know there has been care and attention to detail that has stood the test of time.
From the entrance there is a sunken lounge with a cosy gas heater and a feature exposed brick wall, this flows through to the dining room and functional kitchen with a walk-in pantry and timber cabinetry. A sunroom collecting the westerly rays is to the back of the home while towards the front there are three good sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes. A three-piece bathroom is close by plus a separate toilet. The property has been well maintained with a recently installed reverse cycle split system and new hot water so this is something a buyer can tick on their checklist. The home is secured with quality fencing while the garden is designed for easy maintenance with a private area at the back. There is also a 6m x 5m shed with potential for an office conversion as it has a second toilet, a single carport, there are gates then dividing from the double carport at the front of the home.
Being on the southern side of Bendigo, the suburb of Kangaroo Flat has all the amenities on offer with many walking tracks, lakes, pet recreation areas, major shopping chains, medical centres, a railway station, public transport, a heated pool, gyms and banks, so the popularity of the area is appealing to families, retirees and investors alike. The property is being sold with vacant possession and the furniture in the home is also negotiable. Please feel free to view our 3D walk-through and for a private inspection contact listing agents Nathan Diss and Wes Dorrington.

Description:
High on the Hill with Shedding - Minutes to Amenities
Invest into convenience and comfort with this Kangaroo Flat opportunity. Set between High and Hill Streets and within walking distance to Kangaroo Flat's main shopping precinct sits this three-bedroom weatherboard home designed for your family's comfort and practical needs in mind.
Move and go at your own pace to settle in and update. Stepping inside and onto the timber flooring you are greeted by the three bedrooms and bathroom running along the left side of the home, with the family living quarters to the right.
The open plan living, meals and kitchen enables ease of living; easily keep an eye on the kids while cooking, enjoy the banter around the table of a morning with breakfast or cosy up of a night with a movie.
The spacious kitchen boasts a freestanding stove and views of the backyard. Each bedroom offers large built-in robes, carpet and plenty of natural light. They are serviced by the home's main bathroom with a bath and timber style vanity.
Unique to this property is the additional living space with a generous 5.2m x 2.9m rumpus room, ideal for a kids retreat or study.
The home's ducted heating and cooling throughout and split system in the rumpus enables ease of comfort all year round.
Outside, soak up the morning sun under your enclosed entertaining patio overlooking the rest of the backyard. Two sheds; a 6m x 9m and 6m x 3m adds to the appeal of this home.
A short drive to popular Bunnings and Lansell Square, the location is a winner.

Description:
GREAT RETURN FOR YOUR INVESTMENT! OVER 6% YIELD!
Whether you're already an investor, looking to start your investment portfolio, or an owner occupier, this two-bedroom unit presents an excellent opportunity. With rent set at $220 per week until late August 2020, the rental return is excellent. Do the sums. That's a return of over 6%.
In a complex of three, the unit is superbly located in a very quiet street and within walking distance to Kangaroo Flat shops, Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Kangaroo Flat train station and a short 10-minute drive to the centre of Bendigo.
Stepping through the front door finds the carpeted lounge. Further on is the kitchen which has plenty of bench space & cupboards, electric freestanding stove, large window that lets in heaps of natural light and enough room for a dining table. Further down the hall is the bathroom with shower, vanity and toilet. The laundry is also located here with two storage cupboards. Two decent sized bedrooms are at the rear of the home. There is a new split system for heating and cooling.
For the car accommodation there is a carport with room to park extra vehicles further down the driveway.
Property in this price range is getting very hard to find, so call now to arrange an inspection.
Insights: 1/24 Bank Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2020 and 24 other 2 bedroom unit in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
The perfect location
Currently rented for $230 per week this "Brick Clad" property would make an ideal investment or future family home. Sitting on an allotment of approx. 700 sq metres, this 3 bedroom home has potential to refurbish and create the family home. The wide entry hall leads you to the family lounge with original fireplace. The kitchen is positioned off the lounge and has access through to the rear yard past the 3rd bedroom. The 2 front bedrooms are a good size with ornate ceilings.
The large rear yard is fenced and private with lovely established trees and plenty of room for workshop or car accommodation.
Inside features
3 bedrooms
Original kitchen and bathroom
Ornate ceilings
Outside features
Large allotment of approx. 700 sq metres
One Small garden shed (the 2nd shed is owned by the tenants)
Side access to rear yard
Located within walking distance to Lansell Square Shopping Centre, Playground, parks and public transport.
Insights: 42 Morrison Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2007 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.
